com.judopay

Class JudoOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.judopay.JudoOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable

    public class JudoOptions
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.os.Parcelable
    The wrapper for providing data to Activity and Fragments classes in the SDK (e.g. PaymentActivity). This is preferable to using the individual Extras names defined in Judo as it provides type safety. Use the class for constructing an instance of JudoOptions. When calling an Activity with an Intent extra or a Fragment using an arguments Bundle, use Judo.JUDO_OPTIONS as the extra or argument name.
